column1: Upholding tribal sovereignty and lifting up Native communities. That’s the work we all must recommit to. Today and every other day of the year.
Today is Native American Heritage Day — an important day to celebrate the countless contributions Native Americans have made to our nation’s history.
This has been a difficult year but there is still so much to be grateful for. Wishing everyone a Happy Thanksgiving!

Spent time in Cooke’s Peak Range over the weekend. This is truly one of New Mexico’s special places.   I hope everyone can spend some time outside — it’s so important for our physical and mental health these days. Please recreate responsibly! https://t.co/XErgskAQET

Investing in our state’s outdoor recreation industry will strengthen and grow New Mexico’s economy.   My bill to protect the Gila and San Francisco Rivers is one big step in that direction. https://t.co/rGYhviIug1
All eyes are on Georgia where Jon Ossoff and Rev. Raphael Warnock are in the fight of their lives to flip Georgia blue — and the Senate with it. https://t.co/lV0oQUWqds
I introduced a bill to protect the Pecos watershed from future mining leases. Join me as a citizen co-sponsor to help protect our public lands. https://t.co/a30e9FIsl3
I just introduced a bill to protect the Pecos watershed from future mining leases. Will you become a citizen co-sponsor to help protect our precious public lands? https://t.co/a30e9FIsl3

This week I introduced a bill to protect the Pecos watershed from future mining. This bill will prevent devastating toxic spills and ensure we can enjoy and benefit from the river for generations to come.  No surprise the Trump administration opposes it. https://t.co/Bak1SadWzi
Thanks to years of organizing by and within Hispanic and Native American communities the Southwest is now a stronghold for Democrats.  Arizona. New Mexico. Colorado. Nevada.

Mitch McConnell should be gathering support for another #COVID relief package for families who are struggling to make ends meet. Instead he’s indulging in Trump’s baseless lawsuits and refusing to allow a peaceful transition of power. This is unacceptable.

Control of the Senate will come down to Georgia.   Rev. Raphael Warnock and Jon Ossoff need our support in January’s runoff elections to end Mitch McConnell’s majority. Together let’s flip both of these Georgia seats blue. Pitch in today: https://t.co/lV0oQUWqds

Moving forward we have a lot of work to do to address the climate crisis protect and conserve our public lands and transition to a clean energy economy.  I look forward to working together with the Biden-Harris administration on this critical issue.
It’s ok when the Sore Loser in Chief is gone America will build back better. https://t.co/VBOAqPOtQt

Native American voters turned out in record numbers in this year’s election electing eight Native American representatives to the New Mexico state legislature re-electing @Deb4CongressNM to Congress & helping deliver victory to @JoeBiden.  https://t.co/EfLU9lK0b6
We are experiencing a significant increase in COVID-19 cases and deaths in New Mexico.   I strongly urge everyone to stay safe wear a mask and social distance if you can.  https://t.co/Wl6Fm1gqOR

Let’s get to work on rebuilding this country and restoring the promise of equality justice and opportunity for all.  That means addressing the pandemic the climate crisis systemic racism and a just economic recovery.
Joe Biden leads Donald Trump by over 5 million votes and 76 votes in the electoral college. Time for post-POTUS to grow up and accept defeat. That’s what we do in a Democracy.

.@ReverendWarnock and @ossoff are headed to run-off elections this January. This is our last chance to end Mitch McConnell’s majority.  Let’s flip both of these Georgia seats blue and take back the Senate. Chip in any amount here: https://t.co/MVJNb0ZFBK
What a concept... https://t.co/guF1a7gfks
January 5th. Let's do this! #FliptheSenate https://t.co/iXAnaVszyc

I am enormously proud of the unifying campaigns that Democrats ran in this election cycle from Joe Biden and Kamala Harris to Ben Ray Luján Deb Haaland Xochitl Torres Small Teresa Leger Fernandez & candidates in state and local races in NM. We have so much to be proud of.

Joe Biden has defeated Donald Trump and is now the next President of the United States. Not only did we make history with record turnout in New Mexico and across the country but we also elected Kamala Harris — the first woman of color — as our next Vice President.

It’s official: Both @RaphaelWarnock & @ossoff are headed to run-off elections this January.  Control of the Senate hinges on Georgia and now we only need to flip two more seats to end Mitch McConnell’s majority. Chip in today to help flip both seats blue: https://t.co/lV0oQUWqds
Let’s finish what we started and #FlipTheSenate ! https://t.co/4eMJPGmMOY
4073085. That’s the popular vote margin and counting. America chose @JoeBiden . Fair and square.
These photos are from 2018 and you know it NM GOP.  Here’s another simple fact you should stop ignoring: Masks save lives. https://t.co/Txr2MPdkCy

@JeffMerkley @JoeBiden @KamalaHarris Appreciate it @JeffMerkley . And congrats again on your win this week.
@MurrayCampaign Thanks @MurrayCampaign !

Whether you voted for the first time text or called undecided voters donated to a campaign or talked to your friends & friends about the issues — our country is strongest when we all take part in it.  Thank you for being with us in this fight.
Presidents polls and pundits don’t decide who wins the election.  Voters decide who wins the election.   And every vote must count.
I am proud to announce that 42 of the candidates I endorsed in New Mexico won their races. This is a big step forward for working folks and families in our state! https://t.co/hPWmhkK9Hk
Joe Biden is currently winning the popular vote and the electoral vote.   Once every vote is counted he will have more votes than any American president in history.

Before you head to the polls don’t forget about the critical down-ballot races happening in your local elections! I am thrilled to be supporting these 55 incredible candidates. https://t.co/3t0akPBSjM
If you are planning to vote in person in New Mexico today click here to find your polling place. All polling locations are open from 7 am to 7 pm MT. https://t.co/d0LFUbsRUi

I am proud to endorse Joe Biden and Kamala Harris.   Under their leadership we can unite our nation take on the COVID-19 pandemic armed with facts and science and undo the damage the Trump administration has done to our communities our country & our climate. #TeamJoe
This is it folks. Today we have the opportunity to change the future of our country. As voters head to the polls remember what’s at stake in this election.
Today is Election Day.   Let’s flip the Senate expand the House majority and take back the White House!
Donald Trump: “It’s the great pumpkin eating the sun!”  Martin Heinrich: “Uh no... that’s called an eclipse.”  #VoteScience https://t.co/JVVh3tyxlL

Wende will fight for the people of Bernalillo County. https://t.co/eEASmqSXzp https://t.co/KDkEmxtnbf

In New Mexico Republicans are filing frivolous lawsuits designed to discourage people from voting. It’s time to stand up to all forms of voter suppression & intimidation.   Make your voice heard. Drop off your ballot in-person today or vote early.

Rep. Yvette Herrell's attempts to privatize our public lands in NM would result in no trespassing signs in places that have belonged to the public for generations. If you care about our public lands then vote for @XochforCongress.  Xochitl will keep public lands in public hands.

Mitch McConnell refused to take up critical relief legislation for months while New Mexicans struggled to put food on the table. Meanwhile Senate Republicans found the time to confirm Amy Coney Barrett to the Supreme Court a week before the election.   Vote them out.
